text: Augustus Robin was an engraver and the "premier portraitist in New Orleans".Epoch - Volume 46 - Page 27 His parents were French and he was born in New York City. He worked there, in Philadelphia, and moved to New Orleans in 1838. In New York City he worked for John Chester Buttre.The American Book Collector: A Monthly Magazine for Book Lovers https://books.google.com/books?id=zhjhAAAAMAAJ 1933 ==References== Category:American engravers Category:Businesspeople from New Orleans Category:Businesspeople from New York City
title: Augustus Robin
